monsterDetails.lightShiftAbilityDescription: This Monster may apply an additional stack of any Buff. Additional stacks are only half as strong.

skills.name: Arcane Barrage
skills.description: 10 x 65% (650%) magical damage (neutral) Shield self for 1 x (750 + 200% Max Mana)

skills.name: Armor Bypass
skills.description: This Monster's attacks ignore 20% of the target's Defense damage reduction value.

skills.name: Aurora's Shield
skills.description: Shield all for 3 x (300 + 25% Defense) Removes 2 Debuffs from all allies

skills.name: Barricade
skills.description: Every shield that comes from this Monster (active and passive) has a 4% chance to apply Barrier (Buff).

skills.name: Barrier
skills.description: Applies Barrier (Buff) to whole party

skills.name: Bounty
skills.description: This Monster gets 2 random Buffs when an enemy Monster is knocked out.

skills.name: Buff Mastery
skills.description: This Monster may apply an additional stack of any Buff. Additional stacks are only half as strong.

skills.name: Buffing Restore
skills.description: When applying a Buff, 50% chance that a Debuff is removed.

skills.name: Buffing Shield
skills.description: When applying a Buff, also apply a Shield equal to 30% of this Monster's Defense.

skills.name: Cascade
skills.description: The power of every consecutive hit during an ability is increased by 5% continuously. (For a 4 hit attack: +0%, +5%, +10%, +15%)

skills.name: Chilling Wind
skills.description: 4 x 40% (160%) magical damage (wind) Applies Chill (Debuff)

skills.name: Chilling Wind Lvl 2
skills.description: 5 x 40% (200%) magical damage (wind) Applies Chill (Debuff)

skills.name: Chilling Wind Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 55% (275%) magical damage (wind) Applies Chill (Debuff)

skills.name: Chilling Wind Lvl 4
skills.description: 6 x 55% (330%) magical damage (wind) Applies Chill (Debuff)

skills.name: Chilling Wind Lvl 5
skills.description: 6 x 75% (450%) magical damage (wind) Applies Chill (Debuff)

skills.name: Combo Buffing
skills.description: Every Buff action applies one additional random Buff.

skills.name: Combo Shielding
skills.description: Upon using a Shield action, additionally Shield an ally with the lowest Shield by 50% of this Monster's Defense.

skills.name: Cooling
skills.description: Every hit has a 10% chance to apply Chill.

skills.name: Copy Shield
skills.description: When Shielding yourself, also apply 20% of that Shield to allies.

skills.name: Crit Chance Plus
skills.description: +5% Critical Chance

skills.name: Dark Instinct
skills.description: Increases damage dealt by 20%.

skills.name: Deep Freeze
skills.description: 4 x 85% (340%) magical damage (water) Deals an additional 40% hit for every Chill on the target

skills.name: Deep Freeze Lvl 2
skills.description: 4 x 110% (440%) magical damage (water) Deals an additional 40% hit for every Chill on the target

skills.name: Defense Focus
skills.description: Defense from equipment increased by 25%.

skills.name: Defense Plus
skills.description: Improve Defense rating by 1 (Increases Defense by 37)

skills.name: Defense Proc
skills.description: Every attack triggers an additional hit equal to 50% of Defense value.

skills.name: Fire Resistance
skills.description: Fire damage reduced by 50%

skills.name: Flash Freeze
skills.description: Trigger an additional 100% damage hit when applying Chill (Debuff) with an attack.

skills.name: Full Offense
skills.description: Applies Might, Sorcery & Glory (Buffs)

skills.name: Full Offense Lvl 2
skills.description: Applies Might, Sorcery, Glory & Sidekick (Buffs)

skills.name: Full Offense Lvl 3
skills.description: Applies Might, Sorcery, Glory, Sidekick & Channel (Buffs)

skills.name: Health Plus
skills.description: Improve Health rating by 1 (Increases Health by 332)

skills.name: Ice Hail
skills.description: 3 x 60% (180%) magical damage (water)

skills.name: Ice Hail Lvl 2
skills.description: 4 x 55% (220%) magical damage (water)

skills.name: Ice Hail Lvl 3
skills.description: 4 x 70% (280%) magical damage (water)

skills.name: Ice Hail Lvl 4
skills.description: 5 x 70% (350%) magical damage (water)

skills.name: Ice Hail Lvl 5
skills.description: 5 x 95% (475%) magical damage (water)

skills.name: Ice Shield
skills.description: Shield all for 2 x (200 + 20% Defense + 20% Magic) Applies Chill (Debuff) to a random enemy

skills.name: Ice Shield Lvl 2
skills.description: Shield all for 2 x (300 + 25% Defense + 25% Magic) Applies Chill (Debuff) to 2 random enemies

skills.name: Ice Storm
skills.description: 1 x 160% magical damage (water) Hits all enemies, 50% chance to apply Chill (Debuff)

skills.name: Ice Storm Lvl 2
skills.description: 1 x 210% magical damage (water) Hits all enemies, 50% chance to apply Chill (Debuff)

skills.name: Ice Storm Lvl 3
skills.description: 2 x 130% (260%) magical damage (water) Hits all enemies, 50% chance to apply Chill (Debuff)

skills.name: Magic Plus
skills.description: Improve Magic rating by 1 (Increases Magic by 26)

skills.name: Magic Powered Shield
skills.description: At the start of combat, apply a Shield equal to 150% of Magic value.

skills.name: Magic Proc
skills.description: Every attack triggers an additional hit equal to 35% of Magic value.

skills.name: Mana Plus
skills.description: Improve Mana rating by 1 (Increases Mana by 20. Increases Mana Regeneration by 11)

skills.name: Mana Shielding
skills.description: When attacking an enemy, generate a Shield equal to 15% of Max Mana for each hit.

skills.name: Multi Chill
skills.description: Aura: Chill (Debuff) can be stacked two additional times on enemies. Additional stacks are only half as strong.

skills.name: Polar Winds
skills.description: 2 x 150% (300%) magical damage (wind) Hits all enemies, 50% chance to apply Chill (Debuff) - Heal all allies for (700 + 120% Magic)

skills.name: Protected Offense
skills.description: Aura: While under the effect of a Shield, Monsters in the party deal 10% increased damage.

skills.name: Safecast
skills.description: Applies Barrier (Buff) to whole party Applies Channel (Buff) to a random Monster.

skills.name: Safecast Lvl 2
skills.description: Applies Barrier (Buff) to whole party Applies Channel (Buff) to two random Monsters.

skills.name: Safecast Lvl 3
skills.description: Applies Barrier & Channel (Buffs) to whole party

skills.name: Sheltered
skills.description: While under the effect of a Shield, reduce all incoming damage by 15%.

skills.name: Shield
skills.description: Shield all for 1 x (125 + 40% Defense)

skills.name: Shield Lvl 2
skills.description: Shield all for 1 x (200 + 45% Defense)

skills.name: Shield Lvl 3
skills.description: Shield all for 1 x (350 + 50% Defense)

skills.name: Shield Lvl 4
skills.description: Shield all for 2 x (250 + 25% Defense)

skills.name: Shield Lvl 5
skills.description: Shield all for 3 x (250 + 20% Defense)

skills.name: Spectral Flame
skills.description: 3 x 70% (210%) magical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Spectral Flame Lvl 2
skills.description: 3 x 90% (270%) magical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Spectral Flame Lvl 3
skills.description: 4 x 80% (320%) magical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Spectral Flame Lvl 4
skills.description: 4 x 105% (420%) magical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Spectral Flame Lvl 5
skills.description: 5 x 105% (525%) magical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Spectral Wave
skills.description: 1 x 180% magical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Spectral Wave Lvl 2
skills.description: 1 x 240% magical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Spectral Wave Lvl 3
skills.description: 2 x 145% (290%) magical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Spirit Strength
skills.description: Aura: Buffs are 15% more effective on Spirit Monsters in the party.

skills.name: Static
skills.description: Non-critical hits deal 20% more damage.

skills.name: Static Mass
skills.description: 30% chance to gain a random Buff when landing a non-Critical Hit during attacks.

skills.name: Tenacious Barrier
skills.description: Unique Aura: Barrier also grants a 10% chance to resist the application of Debuffs and harmful Stacks.

skills.name: Variety
skills.description: Every attack deals 15% increased damage when used for the first time during combat. (Different levels count as same attack)

skills.name: Wind Weakness
skills.description: Wind damage increased by 50%
